fields.name: area_id
fields.title: Area ID
fields.description: Must be an area_id from the agreed area hierarchy.

fields.name: age_group
fields.title: Age Group
fields.description: The age group. Must be either "Y000_014" (0-14 y), "Y015_999" (15+ y) or "Y000_999" (0+).

fields.name: calendar_quarter
fields.title: Calendar Quarter
fields.description: The calendar quarter reflected the end of reporting period. Formatted as CY20XXQY, for example CY2020Q4 for end of December 2020.

fields.name: art_current
fields.title: Number on ART
fields.description: Number currently receiving ART at the end of reporting period (year).

fields.name: vls_tested
fields.title: Number VLS Tested
fields.description: The number of people tested for viral load suppression during the reporting period.

fields.name: vls_suppressed
fields.title: Number VLS
fields.description: The number of people who tested positive during the reporting period for supressed viral loads

title: UNAIDS ART Programme Input
description: If data does not exist, please indicate so with the value "NA" and ignore any warning given by Excel.
